data.actual_result: Bot tag gets cut-off or isn't even visible on really long username/nicknamed bots
data.expected_result: Bot tag appears on the right side of it fully visible
data.short_description: Bot tag gets cut-off on the Member List when a bot has a long username or nickname
data.steps_to_repro: - Find or give a bot a long username/nickname (Airhorn is a fine example) - View its name from the Member List
